card_text: This card can attack all monsters your opponent controls once each. You can only use each of the following effects of "King Beast Barbaros" once per turn.$N●You can Tribute monsters whose total Levels equal 8 or more; Special Summon this card from your hand.$N●You can banish 1 "Barbaros" monster from your GY or face-up field, then target 2 cards your opponent controls; destroy them.
